name: 'M*A*S*H' - 'Life with Father' Trivia Game | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the O.R., the doctors busily work away on the latest batch on an endless assembly line of casualties.  Frank is paid a rare compliment, albeit by Margaret.  According to Hot Lips, Frank has the hands of which of these?
questions.explanation:
Concert violinist.

	Usually, Frank is told that his doctoring skills are just one notch above witch doctor status, but this time Frank really impresses.  After Margaret's compliment, Hawkeye, who performs as anesthetist, adds with a hint of derision, 'You could have been a surgeon.'

questions.text: During this episode, Father Mulcahy is caught up in a note he has received from his 'sister, the sister'.  Apparently she is considering leaving her position as a nun.  What is Mulcahy's sister's name?
questions.explanation:
Kathy.

	Father Mulcahy's sister's given name is Kathy, but the Catholic name she has assumed is Maria Angelica.  In her letter she suggests she might leave the order because she is considering becoming a mother.  We also learn that she went to college on a basketball scholarship.

questions.text: Radar distributes the mail to the various 4077th personnel, and Hawkeye accepts one that is simply addressed to 'Occupant: 4077th M*A*S*H'.  It's a 'find the presidents' faces' contest.  What is the setting in which the faces of the presidents are hidden?
questions.explanation:
Barnyard.

	While Trapper receives several letters from his family, and Father Mulcahy the one from his sister, the lonely Hawkeye receives nothing.  Thus he is pleased to open the letter addressed to 'Occupant'.  The winner of this contest will receive a Shetland pony.

questions.text: In their pursuit to find all of the president's faces, which is the first face located by either Hawkeye or Trapper?
questions.explanation:
Calvin Coolidge.

	Hawkeye locates Calvin Coolidges face right near the horses tail.  Trapper then locates Teddy Roosevelt in the tree.  Later, they find Millard Fillmore and Ulysses S. Grant's nose.

questions.text: Henry is pleased to receive several items in the mail, including the latest sleazy movie from the Tobasco Film Company.  What is the title of this new film?
questions.explanation:
What the Parrot Saw.

	Yvonne, Renee and Loretta star in 'What the Parrot Saw'.  Henry is probably the greatest customer of the Tobasco Film Company, as he has ordered so many racy films from them, typically under Radar's name.  When Radar asks if he can finally watch one of the films, Henry says that he'd just be bored, they're medical-related.

questions.text: In the camp, Hawkeye and Trapper meet a young Korean woman holding a baby.  She keeps saying 'Labbi Forbris' over and over again.  This prompts Trapper to mention what name, familiar to fans of the 1970 movie 'MASH'?
questions.explanation:
Forrest.

	At first they misunderstand the woman, who seems intent on getting someone to listen.  Trapper suggests she might mean 'Captain Forrest', the 'brain surgeon who fell down a lot'.  Hawkeye shoots this idea down, as Captain Forrest has been 'gone over 2 years'.  Captain Forrest was played by Tom Skerritt in the film.

questions.text: Finally, they understand what the young woman wants.  She is looking for a rabbi to perform the bris ceremony on her child.  She also reveals that the father is an American G.I.  What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Jacobson.

	Walter R. Jacobson is the name of the father, who we never see.  The very cute child is Sang Min, and the mother is listed in the credits as Chim Sah (though we never hear her name during the episode).

questions.text: Along with the dirty movie, Henry also gets a letter from his wife.  Does his wife ask for a divorce in this letter?
questions.explanation:
No.

	As a matter of fact, her letter is very understanding.  She suggests that Henry is in a difficult situation, where loneliness and other longings can lead to occasional indiscretions.  She adds that she understands if Henry is caught in such a situation, and essentially gives Henry permission to 'fool around'.  He seems very pleased by this letter...at least, at the beginning.

questions.text: Henry is upset by the letter he has received from his wife Lorraine, and he has Radar get in direct contact with her.  On the phone, he learns that she has had a 'brief encounter' with a man named Al Franklin.  At what country club event did this occur?
questions.explanation:
Pumpkin dance.

	After thinking about Lorraine's letter for a while, Henry realizes that she might have written it out of a guilty conscience.  Sure enough, after talking with her he discovers that she has had an affair with Al Franklin, an orthodontist.  Both she and Henry are broken up about it, but they are never able to completely resolve the situation, as the conversation is cut off.

questions.text: Is Radar able to bring a rabbi to the 4077th to perform the bris ceremony for the child?
questions.explanation:
No.

	No, but he does locate a rabbi on the naval carrier Essex.  The bris ceremony is delivered to Radar via Morse Code, and Radar informs Father Mulcahy, who does the actual ceremony.  Hawkeye performs the circumcision, and Trapper administers the wine. Thank you for playing this quiz, I hope you have enjoyed it!
